name: VUIHaiku
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: v. u. i. haiku
des:
Haiku are a form of short, Japanese poetry. They can be serious, emotional, beautiful, or downright dolorous. Often, traditional haiku use references to nature and seasons to comment on a fleeting emotion or create a particular mood

This skill is for VUI designers, who likes haikus.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
